definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: scour, polish (NH id.; Aram. mraq [[מְרַק]]; cf. Ar. maraqa scrape off wool from a skin);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[מִרְקוּ הָֽרְמָחִים]] Je 46:4 polish the lances! Pt. pass. [[מָרוּק]] 2Ch 4:16 polished, of bronze utensils of temple (= [[מְמוֹרָט]] 1Ki 7:45).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[חַמְרִיק]] only Pr 20:30 Kt, fig., in cl. [[בְּרָָע]] ´[[חַבֻּרוֹת פֶּחַע ת]] blows that cut in, cleanse away evil (cf. De Now Wild VB); Qr [[תַּמְרוּק]] i.e. (are) a cleaning. (LXX sunanta=| kakoi=v, whence Gr [[תַּקְדִּים]], Frankenb. [[תִּקְרֶינׇה]], but improb.).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וּמׂרַק]] consec. Le 6:21 be well scoured, of bronze vessel (‖[[וְשֻׁטַּף בַּמָָּיִם]]).
